amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Historically Black Colleges and Universities by $3.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by transfer, the funds for historically Black Colleges and the Tuskegee University by $3.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Davis (AL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
